Title: Establishes the native/pollinator planting fund, the pollinator highway program and creates a distinctive license plate relating thereto
Summary: Establishes the native/pollinator planting fund and the pollinator highway program; creates a distinctive native plant and pollinator license plate with the goal of promoting the cultivation and maintenance of native flowering plants, grasses and shrubs on land bordering state highways and on other public lands.
LawCode: Add ยง99-uu, St Fin L; add ยง67, Hway L; add ยง404-ff, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, the highway law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing the native/pollinator planting fund, the pollinator highway program and creating distinctive native plant or pollinator license plates
